mapper.insert: INSERT INTO restcontents(restcontentsno, adminno, restcateno, title, content, passwd, word, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, rdate) VALUES(restcontents_seq.nextval, #{adminno}, #{restcateno}, #{title}, #{content}, #{passwd}, #{word}, #{file1}, #{file1saved}, #{thumb1}, #{size1}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT restcontentsno, adminno, restcateno, title, content, recom, cnt, replycnt, passwd, word, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1 FROM restcontents ORDER BY restcontentsno DESC

SELECT restcontentsno, adminno, restcateno, title, content, recom, cnt, replycnt, passwd, word, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, map, youtube FROM restcontents WHERE restcateno=#{restcateno} ORDER BY restcontentsno DESC
